EmailTemplate.name: 20140922 - Coffee and Chat (KS1 - Years 1 and 2)
EmailTemplate.subject: An Invitation to KS1 Coffee and Chat
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
You are cordially invited to our Coffee and Chat event for Key Stage 1 (Years 1 and 2) Parents. Details of the event are as follows:
KS1 Coffee and Chat Date : 3rd October 2014 (Friday) Time : 8am - 9am Venue : Primary Canteen
Please RSVP by filling in and submitting the online form below:
KS1 Coffee and Chat online RSVP (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1ymlZRg4MsqV1IJ0wQcLFycY9_qMF06cMbUM3XjyK2W4/viewform)
Kind regards,
Admin Team British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
